LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Blunt.label: Armor - Blunt
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Blunt.description: The chance to prevent blunt damage like club attacks, rock falls, and explosions.
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Piercing.label: Armor - Piercing
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Piercing.description: The chance to prevent piercing damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Heat.label: Armor - Heat
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Heat.description: The chance to prevent temperature-related damage like burns.
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Electric.label: Armor - Electric
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Electric.description: The chance to prevent electric damage like EMP pulses.
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Toxic.label: Armor - Toxic
LanguageData.DamageDeflection_Toxic.description: The chance to prevent toxic damage.
